Ryan Drew's Css Library

Below is the CSS starting off point I use for my projects.



Headers

I belive header tags should have no styling. The way a page should be laid out for SEO purposes doesn't always match the styling you're going for.

Instead, use classes .h1, .h2, etc to apply appropriate styling.

This is the .h1 class

This is the .h2 class

This is the .h3 class

This is the .h4 class

This is the .h5 class
This is the .h6 class


Cards

This is a card title
This is a card body


Colors

There are a handful of default colors.

| text-primary | text-secondary | text-error | text-info | text-red | text-orange | text-yellow | text-green | text-blue | text-purple | text-black | text-grey | text-white
bg-primary | bg-secondary | bg-error | bg-info | bg-red | bg-orange | bg-yellow | bg-green | bg-blue | bg-purple | bg-black | bg-grey | bg-white

Each color has multiple shades.

You can access these shades by using the modifier: "--light-1" through "--light-9" or "--dark-1" through "--dark-9".

bg-primary | bg-primary--light-1 | bg-primary--light-2 | bg-primary--light-3 | bg-primary--light-4 | bg-primary--light-5 | bg-primary--light-6 | bg-primary--light-7 | bg-primary--light-8 | bg-primary--light-9
bg-primary | bg-primary--dark-1 | bg-primary--dark-2 | bg-primary--dark-3 | bg-primary--dark-4 | bg-primary--dark-5 | bg-primary--dark-6 | bg-primary--dark-7 | bg-primary--dark-8 | bg-primary--dark-9

You can change the color of text on hover.

text-hover-primary | text-hover-secondary | text-hover-error | text-hover-info | text-hover-red | text-hover-orange | text-hover-yellow | text-hover-green | text-hover-blue | text-hover-purple | text-hover-black | text-hover-grey | text-hover-white

You can also do this for light and dark variations.

text-hover-primary | text-hover-primary--light-1 | text-hover-primary--light-2 | text-hover-primary--light-3 | text-hover-primary--light-4 | text-hover-primary--light-5 | text-hover-primary--light-6 | text-hover-primary--light-7 | text-hover-primary--light-8 | text-hover-primary--light-9

text-hover-primary | text-hover-primary--dark-1 | text-hover-primary--dark-2 | text-hover-primary--dark-3 | text-hover-primary--dark-4 | text-hover-primary--dark-5 | text-hover-primary--dark-6 | text-hover-primary--dark-7 | text-hover-primary--dark-8 | text-hover-primary--dark-9
